title: PokerZero
desc: A reasoning model built off TinyZero specialized for no-limit texas hold'em, leveraging PPO reinforcement learning and Monte Carlo Tree Search. Built using veRL and PyTorch.

title: Oat Compiler
desc: Fully functional compiler to x86 assembly for Oat, a simple typed, object-oriented programming language. Written in OCaml and featuring a custom LLVM-based IR, control flow analysis and optimizations.

title: 1 Million Checkboxes
desc: Clone of 1 million checkboxes, synced for all users in real time. Leverages Redis, Golang, EC2 and uses web concurrency techniques to scale indefinitely.
